SELECT ta.id AS id, ta.REGULATION_TITLE AS regulationTitle, ta.CREATOR AS creator, ta.ORGANIZATION AS organization, ta.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, ta.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM t_regulation ta where 1=1
AND ta.REGULATION_TITLE like concat(concat('%',#{regulationTitle}),'%')
AND ta.CREATOR like concat(concat('%',#{creator}),'%')
AND ta.create_time >= to_date(#{beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND ta.create_time <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
order by ta.create_time

SELECT ta.id AS id, ta.REGULATION_TITLE AS regulationTitle, ta.CREATOR AS creator, ta.ORGANIZATION AS organization, ta.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, ta.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM t_regulation ta where 1=1
AND ta.REGULATION_TITLE like concat(concat('%',#{regulationTitle}),'%')
AND ta.CREATOR like concat(concat('%',#{creator}),'%')
AND ta.create_time >= to_date(#{beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND ta.create_time <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and rownum < 11 order by ta.create_time desc
